treatment-md.title: Stygobromus Sidorov, Holsinger & Takhteev, 2010, n. sp.
treatment-md.article-title: Two new species of the subterranean amphipod genus Stygobromus (Amphipoda: Crangonyctidae) from Siberia, with new data on Stygobromus pusillus (Martynov) and remarks on morphology and biogeographic relationships
